ch.aplu.util

Enum Console.ClosingMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Console.ClosingMode>
      • ch.aplu.util.Console.ClosingMode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Console.ClosingMode>
    Enclosing class:
    Console

    public static enum Console.ClosingMode
extends java.lang.Enum<Console.ClosingMode>

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      AskOnClose
      AskOnClose -> Shows confirmation dialog asking for termination
      ClearOnClose
      ClearOnClose -> Clears the console content
      DisposeOnClose
      DisposeOnClose -> Closes the console window, but does not shutdown JRE
      HideOnClose
      HideOnClose -> Hides the console, may be shown again by calling show()
      NothingOnClose
      NothingOnClose -> Does nothing
      ReleaseOnClose
      ReleaseOnClose -> Like DisposeOnClose, but throws runtime exception when graphics methods are called
      TerminateOnClose
      Terminating and shutting down JRE by System.exit(0)
